mapper.update: update sale set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
update sale set number = #{number} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update sale set deleteFlag = #{deleteFlag} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select s.id saleId,u.name userName,su.supplier,p.product_name productName,de.name deName,d.number depotName,s.number saleNumber, s.discounts,s.money,s.reality,s.commission,s.state from sale s inner join sys_user u on s.userId = u.id inner join supplier su on s.clientId = su.id inner join product p on s.productId = p.id inner join depot de on s.depotId = de.id inner join depothead d on s.depotheadId = d.id where s.deleteFlag = 0 order by d.createTime desc

select s.id saleId,u.name userName,su.supplier,p.product_name productName,de.name deName,d.number depotName,s.number saleNumber, s.discounts,s.money,s.reality,s.commission,s.state from sale s inner join sys_user u on s.userId = u.id inner join supplier su on s.clientId = su.id inner join product p on s.productId = p.id inner join depot de on s.depotId = de.id inner join depothead d on s.depotheadId = d.id where s.deleteFlag = 1 order by d.createTime desc
select * from sale order by id desc

select s.id saleId,u.name userName,su.supplier,p.product_name productName,de.name deName,d.number depotName,s.number saleNumber, s.discounts,s.money,s.reality,s.commission,s.state,d.createTime,d.amount from sale s inner join sys_user u on s.userId = u.id inner join supplier su on s.clientId = su.id inner join product p on s.productId = p.id inner join depot de on s.depotId = de.id inner join depothead d on s.depotheadId = d.id where s.id = #{id}
